availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Greenville H. Chism (Franklin County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Attoway Sudduth Chism. Father of Christopher C. Chism, Sebastian C. Chism, George W. Chism, Thomas Jefferson Chism, Ludovico Chism and Marine Harrison Chism. Farmer in Franklin County from 1850 to 1870.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 89A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 364
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Bald Knob, p. 21A
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994034, Franklin County Births, 1855, p. 4.
“Deaths,” Frankfort Roundabout (Frankfort, Ky.), June 29, 1895, p. 6.
